item.description: ğŸš¨ URGENT CALL TO ACTION: FLOOD Senator Grassley's Office!ğŸš¨ Senator Chuck Grassley (@ChuckGrassley) is blocking the SAVE Actâ€”refusing to support requiring proof of citizenship for federal voter registration, even though the Constitution empowers Congress to regulate elections! He wrote: â€œI do not believe that Iowa and other states need politicians in Washington, D.C. dictating and controlling how states run their elections.â€ This ignores what Republican voters DEMAND: secure elections NOW! We can't let RINOs stand in the way of election integrity under President Trump. **Tell@ChuckGrassleyto SUPPORT the SAVE Act IMMEDIATELY!** - **Washington D.C. Office Phone:** (202) 224-3744 - **Fax:** (202) 224-6020 - **Online Contact Form:**grassley.senate.gov/contact/â€¦(Fill it out and demand he back the SAVE Act!) - **Official Website:**grassley.senate.govCall, email, faxâ€”make your voice heard LOUD and CLEAR! Let him know Iowa voters (and patriots nationwide) won't stand for this betrayal. Hold him accountable! Tag him everywhere:@ChuckGrassley@GrassleyPress#SAVEAct#ElectionIntegrity#CallGrassley#MAGA#AmericaFirstğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸

item.description: NEW: Shocking details emerge in this triple homicide out of Florida Turns out Ahmad Jihad Bojeh shot up a Wawa in 2021 where one victim was shot several times and nearly died. A judge let him back out into the community on an insanity plea. The judge has the blood of three innocent people on his hands.

item.title: @elonmusk: ELON: AI PROGRESS IS BLOWING MY MIND MULTIPLE TIMES A WEEK â€œWe're in the singularity. We're at the t...
item.description: ELON: AI PROGRESS IS BLOWING MY MIND MULTIPLE TIMES A WEEK â€œWe're in the singularity. We're at the top of the rollercoaster, and you're about to go down. I don't just have courtside seats: I'm on the court. And it blows my mind, and it still blows my mind, sometimes multiple times a week. I'm like, wow and then two days later, more wow! I think we'll hit AGI next year in 2026.â€ Source:@elonmuskin Moonshot â€“ Discussion with@PeterDiamandisand@DavidBlundin, January 2026

item.title: @elonmusk: ELON: THE ECONOMY IS NOT A MAGIC CORNUCOPIA â€œSome people have this absurd view that the economy is l...
item.description: ELON: THE ECONOMY IS NOT A MAGIC CORNUCOPIA â€œSome people have this absurd view that the economy is like some magic horn of plenty. Like it just makes stuff. Goods and services just come from this magic corner of plenty. And if somebody has more stuff than somebody else, itâ€™s because they took more from this magic corner of plenty.â€ Source:@joerogan

item.title: @elonmusk: ELON MUSK: WE ARE REALLY TRYING TO BRING THE WORLD TOGETHER INTO A COLLECTIVE CONSCIOUSNESS ğ• is kin...
item.description: ELON MUSK: WE ARE REALLY TRYING TO BRING THE WORLD TOGETHER INTO A COLLECTIVE CONSCIOUSNESS ğ• is kind of a global town square where people can say what they want to say with words, pictures, video Where there's a secure messaging system we've recently added the ability to do audio and video calls So really trying to bring the world together into a collective consciousness And that's different from just saying, 'What is the most dopamine-generating video stream that one could make?' Which I think can be a little bit of brain rot If you're just watching videos that cause dopamine hits one after another but lack substance, then I think that's not a great way to spend time

item.title: @elonmusk: I was interviewed by BBC along w/@ChiOnwurahabout@Keir_StarmerCOS Morgan McSweeney, who started Cent...
item.description: I was interviewed by BBC along w/@ChiOnwurahabout@Keir_StarmerCOS Morgan McSweeney, who started Center for Countering Digital Hate (CCDH). Onwurah lied to listeners claiming "Conservatives" passed Online Safety Act, no Morgan McSweeney's CCDH. Yes, but the Conservative was Damien Collins, who was on the board of CCDH. Does Onwurah not know what's going on inside her own government?@EthanCroft98@paddymacc1@AvaSantina@WorldByWolf@jodymcintyre_@kennardmatt@Ian_Fraser@NJ_Timothy@SteveNickSmith@CharlotteCGill@JuliaHB1
